item.title: The Last Layer: Rethinking My Fitness, From Cholesterol to VO2 Max
item.description: The Last Layer: Rethinking My Fitness, From Cholesterol to VO2 Max Date: January 2, 2026 Tags: Fitness, VO2 Max, Health, Goals, Independence Consistency is often sold as the hardest part of fitness. For the last two years, I’ve mastered it. I’ve shown up to the gym more regularly than ever before in my life. But looking back, I realize that while my attendance was perfect, my effort was plateauing. I haven’t been pushing limits; I’ve been coasting in my comfort zone.
